title: 10/21/21: Welfare Proposals, Tax Policy, Trump's Next Move, Airlines Backdown, Rogan vs CNN, Kill the Bill, Marriage Disparity, College Football, and More!

itunes:title: 10/21/21: Welfare Proposals, Tax Policy, Trump's Next Move, Airlines Backdown, Rogan vs CNN, Kill the Bill, Marriage Disparity, College Football, and More!
itunes:author: Breaking Points
itunes:subtitle: Krystal and Saagar discuss the latest welfare and tax provisions in the budget reconciliation package, Trump's new media company, airlines changing their vaccination policy, Joe Rogan's battle against CNN, the progressive case for voting down the proposed budget, growing marriage inequality in America, college football unionization, and more!
